name: react-spa-ssr-quick-start-demo
description: React single page application with server side rendering step-by-step quick start demo.

scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development; export HARD_ENV=development; rship run dev
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production; export HARD_ENV=development; rship setup && rship run prod
scripts.node: export NODE_ENV=production; export HARD_ENV=development; node dist/server/server.js

author: Pavel Kondratenko <iam@kondratenko.me>
